data.eml:eml: A review of the Chinese species of Bothropolys Wood, 1862 (Chilopoda: Lithobiomorpha: Lithobiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Hui-Qin, Song, Da-Xiang, Zhu, Ming-Sheng (2008): A review of the Chinese species of Bothropolys Wood, 1862 (Chilopoda: Lithobiomorpha: Lithobiidae). Zootaxa 1786: 35-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182487
